title: nirutta gaNapatiyE
sahitya:
nirutta gaNapatiyE unai manattuL tuNai varuvAi 
varuttam tuyargaLaiyum ainkaratta karimukhanE karuNai nidhiyE


P:  nirutta gaNapatiyE unai manattuL tuNai varuvAi 
varuttam tuyargaLaiyum ainkaratta karimukhanE karuNai nidhiyE
A:  ninaikkum aDiyavar azhaittiDavE dinam tuNaikku vandiDum bhUmaNiyE 
shiram paDam uyarkkum saguNa narguNa parabrahma svarUpanE
    caraNam 2    Adi nAyakan aruL nidhiyE vEda nAyakan sukhabhavanE
mOdakam Endum muzhu muttanE nAdarUpanaiya nAyakanE
vAmanE varum vAnavarum dinam vaNangiDum vAraNa mAmukhanE
mA mada nenjaiyai dayai purindaruLvAi taruNam iduvE muraLi paNindiDavE
